author: ehu
msg: Resolve issue #2470: Support global ignores in svn_load_dirs.pl.
(opt_glob_ignores): New. Stores the global ignores pattern found.

author: cmpilato
msg: Finish issue #2751 -- Directory prop mods reverted in overlapping

author: lgo
msg: Fix issue #2468: status -uN is not showing the status of remotely changed files
(make_dir_baton): collect the statii of the files in the target directory
(close_directory): always descend in the target directory, but specify if we
want that to be recursive or not.
(status_nonrecursive_update): change a path not directly in the target
directory to check the -N flag is actually working.
